website_summaries.verdict: The SOL Republic Shadow are a set of neckband-style Bluetooth earphones that deliver massive bass response in a flexible design.
pros: Powerful audio with massive bass and very bright highs
Ships with multiple eartipsâand a lifetime guarantee of unlimited replacement eartips

customer_reviews.title: So unreliable
customer_reviews.text: I LOVED these headphones when I first got them - exactly what i wanted. But now, less than 2 years on, I cannot begin to describe the frustration - and I don't use them frequently. I charge them fully before any long journey and sometimes they last the trip, even the day if I use them sparingly. But recently, they keep dropping the bluetooth connection and go dead after barely half an hour or so. They tick the box for design idea and even sound, but I cannot recommend anyone to buy them - they are so unreliable. Out of warranty and but used probably no more than 20 or so times.
customer_reviews.author: cmn

customer_reviews.title: Unreliable
customer_reviews.text: Had headphones just over 2 months. When working they were great but do not seem to last. One channel now drops volume off and on and the controls side of the unit got very warm and battery life sunk to less than 2 hours. Now trying to navigate Amazon returns policy - they do not seem to understand the term fit for purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Walter

customer_reviews.title: Worst
customer_reviews.text: Item would not connect via Bluetooth unless you search everytime. This is frustrating. Also, if you turn your head while your phone is in your pocket the sound will start to skip. This is the worst case I've encountered. Amazon would not let me return because it is a marketplace order. Stay clear!!!
customer_reviews.author: Nono

customer_reviews.title: Battery gone
customer_reviews.text: Nice sound (8/10) bit low the base. Good for running, but sometimes annoying. I didn`t use it for a while (I had a comfy wired one). Later I realized the battery not that good. (I only could charge it on pc`s usb port) 2 or 4 hour listening per day, and it switched off. After three months I can`t switched it on. I think it`s too expensive for this type of fault.
customer_reviews.author: terar

customer_reviews.title: Battery no longer charges after 7 months of intermittent use
customer_reviews.text: Excellent sound and very comfortable. But after barely 7 months of intermittent use (one hour five times a week in the fitness club) its battery is no longer charging. Pity really because I really liked them. Hopefully a new model with a more reliable battery will be issued soon.
customer_reviews.author: F. A. Cuello

customer_reviews.title: Wow! My second pair!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent delivery service as always. This is my second pair of the shadow wireless headphones. The sound is incredible which produces a plenty of bass. Also good using my phone offering a very good reception. Fast connection via bluetooth. Please note it is not good for the gym but you do have the option of the sports version.
customer_reviews.author: Marq

customer_reviews.title: Worst headphones I've ever tried
customer_reviews.text: They must be the worst headphones I've ever tried. Bass is so thin and light that it's like not even there. High pitches distorted and not solid. I would discourage anybody from buying them. Returned them already.
customer_reviews.author: David-e.uk

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as expected
customer_reviews.text: Not as good as I expected, when on a phone call it doesn't always pick up everything and sometimes I have to call right back as it makes the voice sound like a monster. Also, a lot of faffing about with delivery even thought I paid for next day delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best wireless earphones I've tried so far!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these! I previously had the Jaybird X2 earphones and they just wouldn't say in my ears no matter what I tried and they kept slipping around the neck. But with these, I haven't had a problem with them fitting in my ear, they stay in my ears until I take them out. They sit comfortably around the neck thanks to the neckband. They last me all day and they are quick to charge. They sound is also great, I would recommend these to anyone looking for some good wireless earphones!
customer_reviews.author: Hayley Charman

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the hassle
customer_reviews.text: These have been frustrating from day one. The Bluetooth connection is unreliable and no matter what device I use they drop connection all the time. Getting them to connect properly is always a hassle. The sound quality is good all round but if they don't do what they are supposed to (i.e. Bluetooth connection) then that ruins the whole experience. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: AB_N10

customer_reviews.title: Love the Sound but battery life lets it down
customer_reviews.text: Just got these a couple of weeks ago and when I first used them i thought oh wow these sound great. Much better than my other pair of bluetooth buds. They are comfortable with a rich warm sound, but....... the battery life is no where's near 8 hours. Closer to 3 1/2 hours really which is less than half of what is advertised. I was upgrading for a better battery so this has left me rather disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Hou

customer_reviews.title: Good headphones with a small caveat
customer_reviews.text: Quite a good sound quality complemented by convenient ergonomic design. The build quality though is a bit questionable - it's already a third piece I've exchanged, each year I'm forced to claim a return since one headphone (right mostly) stops working. Luckily with amazon excellent support it's absolutely not a problem.
customer_reviews.author: Ruff

customer_reviews.title: Use a different brand
customer_reviews.text: They are ok at first. After a few months of constant use the sound quality drops. My last 3 pairs last 3/4 months each until they broke in some way. I'm moving on to a different brand
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great design, great performance
customer_reviews.text: Great sound, easy to use and decent battery life. Previously had the Skull Candy Method Wireless which had a great sound but wasn't as comfortable and the controls less intuitive. The extra cost for the Sol Republic is well worth it in my option.
customer_reviews.author: Martin Bauer

customer_reviews.title: Great sound wirelessly!
customer_reviews.text: Easy connection although took a bit more time with my Bluetooth dongle on my laptop... good bass and highs. Great product with long lasting charge
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Packs a punch
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this..sits on my neck on most days
customer_reviews.author: cajani

customer_reviews.title: Simple to wear.
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my son's birthday. They have been around his neck since and had no complaints so great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing Christmas Present...
customer_reviews.text: Bought these 8 Dec 16. However, since they were a Christmas present, they have been used for less than 6 weeks - right ear pod not working already! Checked charging etc, still not working. Awaiting reply from supplier on possible replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Initially worked great but then developed a problem with one sale going ...
customer_reviews.text: Initially worked great but then developed a problem with one sale going very quiet. Disturbingly I thought i was having hearing problems until reversing the earpieces showed it was a headphones fault.
customer_reviews.author: Stuart S.

customer_reviews.title: One of my very best international amazon experiences
customer_reviews.text: One of my very best international amazon experiences. The product is fantastic - simple, intuitive, works perfectly. Customer service was exceptional - very responsive and sincere. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Robertson

customer_reviews.title: They were very good sounds very good when I first got them but ...
customer_reviews.text: They were very good sounds very good when I first got them but after a few weeks the battery kept on going down on me.
customer_reviews.author: Barry b

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice sound in wide range.Satisfied with the design as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... out whilst moving - despite changing 'buds'- otherwise they're great.
customer_reviews.text: Ear plugs keep falling out whilst moving - despite changing 'buds'- otherwise they're great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sol republic
customer_reviews.text: Good sound quality, design , price but they dont stay on my ears for long
customer_reviews.author: Theo

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Totally love it. I bought a pair of them, but navy ones are even cooler
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor product and service by maker
customer_reviews.text: Never got the dual connection feature to work. Five months after purchase they are failing to hold a charge for longer than 30 minutes and getting very hot. Contacted the maker but was simply told to.take it up with Amazon. Trying to find a way of doing this after this length of time on the Amazon site was a real challenge but once contacted Amazon immediately offered a replacement or refund. A great shame as it could have been a good product.
customer_reviews.author: Ray S

customer_reviews.title: SOL REPUBLIC FOR ME ARE USUALLY THE BEST BUT THESE ARE NOT GOOD AT ALL VERY DISSAPPOINTED
customer_reviews.text: THESE HEADPHONES ARE NOT SPORTS HEADPHONES. THE TWO RECTANGULAR BLOCKS ARE NOT BALANCED THEREFORE SLIDE OFF YOUR NECK AS YOU ARE RAINING. ALSO THEY ARE TO HEAVY AND PULL THE BUDS OUT OF YOUR EARS. SOL REPUBLIC FOR ME ARE USUALLY THE BEST BUT THESE ARE NOT GOOD AT ALL VERY DISSAPPOINTED.
customer_reviews.author: M. N. Iqbal

customer_reviews.title: Attempted to use with my mobile phone (regular calls) and ...
customer_reviews.text: Attempted to use with my mobile phone (regular calls) and with my PC (skype calls). Microphone very low - people at the other end could not hear me. Very unimpressed.
customer_reviews.author: Mark W.

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the gym. Good sound quality and lengthy battery life. Marvellous value for money.
customer_reviews.author: CALUM D.

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I've tried a number of wireless bluetooth earphones and headphones and, to be honest, to date, found most of them unsatisfactory because the sound that comes out of most of them is still somewhat muffled and quiet. Not the case with this pair. Easy to set up, stylish appearance and good sound quality that's clear and of adequate level. Comes with 4 sizes of ear pieces, nicely packaged such that it can also be used as a gift. Very convenient to use and quite discreet.
customer_reviews.author: Chatterbox

customer_reviews.title: Used a pair of these for 4 years and they ...
customer_reviews.text: Used a pair of these for 4 years and they are still going strong. Going to buy a second pair for when these finally die.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. D. Bell

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought a set in US 3 yrs ago. Still gives me 4-6 hours per charge and incredible sound. I commute weekly (6 hours per trip) and not a single hiccup . Fantastic !!
customer_reviews.author: Clayton Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy these..
customer_reviews.text: Bought these in July from Amazon, average at best. The right ear now after 5 months light use doesn’t work. I don’t think that’s acceptable for nearly a £100?
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Fellows

customer_reviews.title: impressive sound quality
customer_reviews.text: These are just great. Chrystal clear sound quality with good base which is really impressive. Comfortable to wear. Easy to use. Gets a bit of getting sued to changing volume at neck. I have used various makes of headphones and the sound quality from these compares really well. I am impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Musicfan

product_meta.title: SOL Republic Shadow Wireless Headphones - Bluetooth Neckband Earphones, Immersive Sound Earbuds, Mic, 10m Range, 8hrs Battery, Sweat, Rain Resistant Perfect for Gym, Sports – Black
product_meta.description:
Colour Name:BlackSleek and seamless, it’s the way a wireless headphone should be. Shadow features a minimalistic design with tasteful accents that blends with any style. Its flexible biomorphic neckband rests comfortably around your neck - so light you’ll forget that it’s there. With an 8-hour rechargeable battery life, you can wear it and play music all day long. You’ll hear … Low, rich bass and amazing clarity, sounding better than most wired headphones.

BOX CONTAINS
Wireless In Ear Headphones
feature_bullets: SOUND: Strong, powerful sound with extra low bass. Multiple size in ear tips, allows you to get just the right fit for sealing the ear and isolating outside noise. Music sounds way better – when it’s just the music.
STYLE: Shadow's premium design allows you to wear this all day while looking good. Simple, minimalistic design, beautifully crafted with tasteful accents goes with every style.

COMFORT: The weight of the battery and other electronics are kept away from your sensitive ears and are strategically placed in an ergonomic ultra light neckband. Surprisingly so comfortable, you’ll often forget that it’s there.
COMPATIBILITY: Got a tablet or laptop? Switch between 2 Bluetooth devices so you can watch a video while staying connected to your phone. Compatible with Bluetooth on your Apple or Android devices.
STORAGE: Foldable neckband travels easily in your purse or pocket.
